Room.Name: Path West of the Manor
Room.ShortDescription: You are on the path that runs around the western side of the Manor.
Room.LongDescription: The path ends at the front door of the Mausoleum. It is a large, stone door that doesn't seem to want to budge. There is a small window that you can look into. The Mausoleum is pretty small and holds but a single coffin in the center of the room. Other than that, the room is virtually empty, with a few pictures lying thrown about.
